scripts.browserify: browserify src/main.js -u jquery -u knockout -u ./config --standalone DotaFlashCardsApp > www/bundle.js
scripts.replace:css: replace 'app.css' 'app.min.css' build/index.html && replace '<link rel="stylesheet" href="slider.css">' '' build/index.html
scripts.replace: npm run replace:js && npm run replace:css
scripts.build:js: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.build:html: npm run preprocess:html && npm run copy:html && npm run replace
scripts.build: npm run clean:build && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:css
scripts.stage: npm run build && npm run stage:rev
scripts.deploy: npm run stage && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run browserify && npm run preprocess:html' src
